issues.message: ['Transplant one blood vessel organoid per kidney into the kidney capsule of immunocompromised mice. Entire organoid transplanted. Can be grown >6 months. CRITICAL: Inefficient differentiation may cause teratoma.'] is not of type 'object'
['Sacrifice mice and collect transplanted blood vessel organoids. Keep non-transplanted kidney as negative control.'] is not of type 'object'
['Fix transplants and kidney tissue in 4% PFA solution overnight at 4 °C.'] is not of type 'object'
['Dehydrate and paraffinize samples according to standard histological procedures.'] is not of type 'object'
['Cut 2- to 5-μm sections with a standard cryostat and collect on Ultra Plus slides.'] is not of type 'object'
['Perform standard de-paraffinization procedures.'] is not of type 'object'
['Follow Steps 39–45 of the Procedure to stain organoids.'] is not of type 'object'
['Carefully remove all PBS from the slides with a cellulose wipe.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add a few drops of mounting medium and lay a coverslip on top. Avoid air bubbles.'] is not of type 'object'
['Dry overnight in the dark at room temperature.'] is not of type 'object'
['Seal the slide with nail polish.'] is not of type 'object'
['Proceed to Step 47 of the Procedure to image organoids.'] is not of type 'object'
